greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of all prime factors of n; primes nonincreasing, starting with the largest prime factor: A006530(n).
comment: a(n) = n iff n prime, a(A000040(n)) = A000040(n).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: aspf[n_]:=Total[Times@@@Partition[Riffle[Reverse[Flatten[Table[#[[1]],{#[[2]]}]&/@FactorInteger[n]]],{1,-1},{2,-1,2}],2]]; Join[{0}, Array[ aspf,80,2]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 19 2015 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 18 2002
